author: Kaya Axelsson, Eli Mitchell-Larson, Kaya Axelsson, Eli Mitchell-Larson
title: The world will recover from coronavirus – but unless we learn from the pandemic, it won't recover from climate change
description: As soon as the number of daily recoveries exceeds the number of daily infections, the impacts of the virus will begin to recede. In contrast, every ton of carbon dioxide we emit resides in our climate indefinitely
content:
Leading scientists repeatedly warned us it was coming. They told us it would kill millions, cost trillions, and transform the way we live, but that modest preparation could forestall the worst impact.
